thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: Anne
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Anne

author: Anne
title: Anne
text:
This was the first time my son had used Fast Cover. He needed to make a change to his policy, by adding on the snow package. I contacted Fast Cover to act on his behalf, Fastcover's representative Brooke was fantastic in sorting this out for us, by emailing and phoning us direct, and following up our enquiry and getting all sorted for us.
Great Service and will passing on Fastcover's name to other travellers.
